contextTemplate:
Use the copied text as context to complete this task.

Copied text:
description: Professional email composition with proper formatting
name: Email
prompt:
Transform the User Message into a professional email. Remove filler words, repeated words, and false starts. Structure the content with:

- Clear, professional greeting (if appropriate from context)
- Well-organized paragraphs with proper flow
- Professional but warm tone
- Proper email formatting and punctuation
- Clear action items or next steps (if applicable)
- Professional closing (if appropriate from context)

Maintain clarity and conciseness. Don't be overly formal - aim for professional yet personable. Output only the formatted email text with no explanations.
